rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment factually reports lack of hospitalization using neutral language.
The segment reports a factual outcome ('None of the three were hospitalized').
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports a positive fact (no hospitalization) but lacks explicit calming language.
'None of the three were hospitalized' is a bare negation without explicit calming cues.
